name: Golden Couscous
recipeCategory: easy, quick, weekday, salads and dressings
keywords: chicken stock, corn kernels, couscous, cumin, extra virgin olive oil, onion, turmeric, yellow bell pepper, side dish, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 large yellow pepper, seeded and diced
Kernels from 4 ears of fresh yellow corn
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Heat one tablespooon of the oil in a skillet, add the pepper and onion and saute over medium heat until golden. Stir in the corn and cook briefly for a few minutes. Season to taste with salt and pepper and set side.
Bring the chicken stock to a boil in a saucepan, stir in the turmeric and cumin and add 2 tablespoons of olive oil. Stir in the couscous, remove from heat, cover and let stand for 5 minutes.
Fluff the couscous with a fork and fold in the pepper and corn mixture. Fluff again and serve warm or at room temperature.
